Obligatory "I'm not a game designer" goes here! 

It'll be interesting to see how Karthus goes with Luden's Echo, as though generally casts very often, he's also pretty immobile and won't be getting much charge from movement. The ults sound pretty amazing, though!

I'm actually pretty excited about playing AP Evelyn with that item - she seems to be the best able to take advantage of that passive. As it's charging both when you're moving and casting spells, she has a lower-cooldown spell that she's able to cast while running, and take full advantage of the Movement Speed.  The other champion that comes to mind is Cassiopeia - once she's chasing you and resetting her E, she's going to charge it up crazy fast. :D
I feel the same way man
